name: Plant Skater v0.01
description:
Do you love skating?

Do you like videogames?

But do you dislike the realization that your human form in its infinite potential will never achieve true photosynthesis?!

WELL, YOU'RE IN LUCK!

Cause it's time to skate and you're a plant?!

Plant Skater!

CONTROLS:

W,S,A,D - movement

INTERFACE:

LOCK - gives you a plant locked to the board

RESET - resets the level and cleans the debris
